duck: Lipman Bers, Latvian-American mathematician, or to various mathematical concepts named after Bers:
BERS (software), an Australian computer program for House Energy Rating
Bers slice - In the mathematical theory of Kleinian groups, Bers slices and Maskit slices, named after Lipman Bers and Bernard Maskit, are certain slices through the moduli space of Kleinian groups.
Bers (Albania), one of the Villages of Dibër County
Bers area inequality - In the mathematical theory of Kleinian groups, the Ahlfors finiteness theorem describes the quotient of the domain of discontinuity by a finitely generated Kleinian group.
Bers (Wales), or Y Bers, the Welsh name of the town of Bersham
Father Bers, a German writer who traced the origin of the Prayer to Saint Michael

wiki.text:
'Bers' may refer to *Lipman Bers, Latvian-American mathematician, or to various
mathematical concepts named after Bers: **Bers area inequality **Bers
compactification **Bers density conjecture **Bers slice *Bers (Albania), one of
the Villages of Dibër County *Bers (Wales), or Y Bers, the Welsh name of the
town of Bersham *Basse Bers and Haute Bers, villages in the Rimbach-près-
Masevaux commune of northeastern France *BERS (software), an Australian computer
program for House Energy Rating *Father Bers, a German writer who traced the
origin of the Prayer to Saint Michael *Bers, the piece corresponding to the
chess queen in the Mongolian board game Hiashatar *Bers., an abbreviation for
the Italian Army rank of Bersagliere *Bers, another word for jujubes, the fruit
of the Ziziphus mauritiana tree
wiki.title: bers
